argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lssvancl.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lssvancl.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lssvancl.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lssvancl.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 5 |  | lssvancl.u | |- ( ph -> U e. S ) |
| 6 |  | lssvancl.x | |- ( ph -> X e. U ) |
| 7 |  | lssvancl.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) |
| 8 |  | lssvancl.n | |- ( ph -> -. Y e. U ) |
| 9 | 1, 3 | #P_lssel | |- ( ( U e. S /\ X e. U ) -> X e. V ) |
| 10 | 5, 6, 9 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> X e. V ) |
| 11 | 1, 2 | #P_lmodcom | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( Y .+ X ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 10, 7, 11 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( Y .+ X ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_lssvancl1 | |- ( ph -> -. ( X .+ Y ) e. U ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_eqneltrrd | |- ( ph -> -. ( Y .+ X ) e. U ) |
